flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in width between where they're starting from and their destination is 80-50 = <<80-50=20>>20 yards
The width increases 2 yards every 10 m along the river so they would have to cover (20/2)*10 = <<(20/2)*10=100>>100 meters
Traveling at the rate of 5m/s, he will spend 100/5 = <<100/5=20>>20 seconds
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
